message.en: This world that you traverse is the [color=#ee8695]host's[/color] mind.
message.es: This world that you traverse is the [color=#ee8695]host's[/color] mind.

message.en: As you can tell,{p=0.2} it's not exactly...{p=0.5} hospitable.
message.es: As you can tell,{p=0.2} it's not exactly...{p=0.5} hospitable.

message.en: Uncertainty.{p=0.5} Anxiety.{p=0.5} Small doses of depression.{p=0.5} You know,{p=0.2} the usual.
message.es: Uncertainty.{p=0.5} Anxiety.{p=0.5} Small doses of depression.{p=0.5} You know,{p=0.2} the usual.

message.en: Who would've thought a mere [color=#bf6dbf]pandemic[/color] could do this?
